body: He didn't want revenge. He wanted a family, but couldn't trust his wife. So when he is away, he makes sure that his son, the other member of the family, can chain her to the family.
Instead he should have use that drug on his ex-wife via his son that would be nice revenge to her.

Those who are quick to judge the dad have never been cheated on not by a girlfriend, but by a wife. You can easily lose your sanity. He is just damaged and is trying his hardest to secure a happy household. I feel sorry for him because he has been reduced to this state. Only someone who can see through his damaged heart can help him heal.
